segments.text: This kitchen is a total mess; look at that overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing everywhere, soaking the cabinets— gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, oblivious and careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting wet too; how unhygienic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those dirty dishes stacked on the counter aren't helping.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting, and he's making it worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the jar like that— crumbs everywhere soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, but this whole sneaky act is annoying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's slippery and filthy now from the spill.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the pretty garden outside can't make up for this sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand seeing such neglect in a home.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the water already; it's revolting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is just too chaotic and unclean.
segments.speaker: PAR
